2.name: Vega
2.info:
Negative Energy
A negative energy fills the battlefield and makes every non-Dark, non-Ghost and non-Psychic type Pokémon take 6.25% damage at the end of every turn.

4.name: Mel
4.info:
Inverse Battle
Type matchups are reversed and no type is immune to any other type.

5.name: Galavan
5.info:
Magnet Rise
Permanent Magnet Rise effect for Steel-Type & Electric-Types making them immune to Ground type attacks.

6.name: Big Mo
6.info:
Inverse Gravity
Permanent Trick Room effect for weight, heavier Pokémon go first.

7.name: Tessy
7.info:
Camo-mons
The Pokémon's types are that of the types of their first two attacks.

8.name: Benjamin
8.info:
Benjamin Butterfree
When a Pokémon is knocked out, instead of fainting it devolves to a previous evolution. The Pokémon finally faints when it can’t devolve anymore.

e1.name: Moleman
e1.info:
Vicious Sandstorm
Vicious sand causes Pokémon to lose ⅛ of max HP at the end of every turn

e2.name: Elias
e2.info:
Shadowy Veil
Every Ghost-type Pokémon take half damage on full HP. Ghost-types are immune to entry hazards at full HP. Other Types cannot use Safeguard or Substitute.

e3.name: Arabella
e3.info:
Fairy ring
All Fairy-Type Pokémon get a +1 boost to their lowest Defense stat on switch in.

e4.name: Penny
e4.info:
Rainbow Battle
All Dragon-type Pokémon on the field have their moves' secondary effect chance doubled. This stacks Serene Grace with the exception of flinching moves.
